name: jafFedora
short_description: jafFedora is a set of CakePHP models plus datasource to allow you to build a web interface to a Fedora-Commons repository.  It organizes calls to the Fedora REST API under six main areas - objects, datastreams, relationships, methods, repository and services.  It supports the FOXML 1.1 digital object specification helping admins to ensure validity of the stored objects.
summary: jafFedora is a CakePHP interface for Fedora-Commons
